problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,P为AB延长线上一点,PC切⊙O于点C,PC=4,PB=2,则⊙O的半径等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, P is a point on the extended line line of AB, PC tangents ⊙O at point C, PC = N_0, PB = N_1, then the radius of ⊙O is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PC切⊙O于点C,PC=4,PB=2,∴PC²=PB×PA,即4²=2PA,解得PA=8,∴OA=OB=\frac{1}{2}(PA-PB)=3,故⊙O的半径为3．故选:C．
